FunctionalRequirements.Name: Voice-Guided Event Participation
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED should provide step-by-step voice instructions to guide users through joining and participating in virtual social events, ensuring ease of use for those intimidated by technology.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Personalized Medication Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED must allow users to set up personalized medication reminders via voice or text, confirm when medication is taken, and notify caregivers if a dose is missed, ensuring privacy and user control.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Adaptive Cognitive Exercises
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED should provide daily cognitive exercises tailored to the user's preferences and abilities, adjusting difficulty based on performance and offering encouragement to maintain motivation.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Accessible Voice Interaction
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED must ensure that all voice interactions are clear, simple, and accessible to users with varying technical abilities, including those with cognitive or physical limitations.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Data Privacy and Security
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED must ensure that all user data, especially health-related information, is stored securely and shared only with explicit user consent, adhering to privacy regulations.
